0: At the pool Bernardo and Arturo who run the beach pool area for Royal Service were super especially given the challenges of a holiday week
In January it made for a very pleasant swim
It was so nice to come back to you room after a day at the pool or beach to find a bubble bath topped with rose pedals
The pool waiter Fransisco was great
Nice big rooms Lots of pools and of course the beach area
By the pool all of the waitstaf were really on top of drink service
On our last full day at the pool workers were setting up several tables and a bar for a private cocktail party for Pandora
The most highlighted great things from Paradisus is their huge and nice swimming pools
Royal serve pool Baile beds and pool side restaurant are great
1: Hector was so kind he remembered which drinks we liked and if we were swimming when he got back from the bar he would bring our drinks to the side of the pool so we did not even have to get out
It was a little big and busy for our taste but the food was great and the pools and beach were great
The pools are huge and we never felt like it was too crowded
Crazy huhNext good luck finding chairs by the pool or beach with any shade these are all reserved for the Melia group people or 50 a bed per day you may be lucky
People I strongly suggest you to book the Bali beds at the pool so you and your family could feel comfortable
Once it stopped raining we enjoyed the Bali beds we walked along the ocean and we got in the pool
The pool bar offers brand spirits where you set the limit
The main pool has the pool bar and of course by mid afternoon it is packed with people that are there for hours never leaving
The beach and pool were nice but crowded in the early afternoons
They also were playing right next to the pool bar and constantly splashing pool wate in our drinks
2: They really made our time by the pool hotel great
One day a young lady swam out too far and could not get back
We are beach people and found that if you do not have someone in your party go down at 630 am and put towels under the umbrellas you will not get any shade for the day same with the pool
I did not see them using a pool vacuum to make sure everything was cleaned up
Beach and pools Above Getting change and small bills for tips
We also spoiled ourselves by renting a polside bed cabana each day
Volleyball at the beachWorst part The pools are not really inviting The depths of the pools go from waist deep to 6 feet
The pools were not adequately heated during our time there but the staff and service were really kind and amazing
Also we hung out at the main pool because the adult pool never had music playing and was pretty dead to hang out by
We dined at one of the properties every night of the week or at the royal tower lounge the palapa restaurant or by the pool in our Bali Bed
